metadata.description: This will be used to validate Generative Answer type of tests using Application Insight result.

Specifies the Power Automate maker portal URL used to configure or trigger flows, primarily for GCC (Government Community Cloud) environments. This can be left as it is for non-GCC organizations where the standard environment is used.

parameters.$filter:
_cat_copilottestrunid_value eq '@{triggerOutputs()?['body/InputParameters/CopilotTestRunId']}' 
and statecode eq 0 
and cat_resultcode ne 2 and cat_resultcode ne 3 and cat_resultcode ne 4 
and (cat_CopilotTestId/cat_testtypecode eq 4 or cat_CopilotTestId/cat_testtypecode eq 5) 
and _cat_parent_value eq null

parameters.$select: cat_delayforazureapplicationinsightsenrichment, cat_isgeneratedanswersanalysisenabled, cat_azureappinsightsapplicationid, cat_azureappinsightstenantid, cat_azureappinsightsclientid, cat_azureappinsightssecretlocationcode, cat_azureappinsightssecret, cat_azureappinsightsenvironmentvariable

parameters.item/cat_AppInsightsQuery:
customEvents
| where name == "GenerativeAnswers"
| where tostring(todynamic(customDimensions).conversationId) == "@{items('Apply_to_each_Generative_Answers_Result')?['cat_name']}"
| where timestamp between ((datetime(@{items('Apply_to_each_Generative_Answers_Result')?['cat_responsereceivedtimestamp']}) - 1h) .. (datetime(@{items('Apply_to_each_Generative_Answers_Result')?['cat_responsereceivedtimestamp']}) + 1h))
| extend cd = todynamic(customDimensions)
| extend result = tostring(cd.Result)
| project result

customEvents
| where name == "GenerativeAnswers"
| where tostring(todynamic(customDimensions).conversationId) == "@{items('Apply_to_each_Generative_Answers_Result')?['cat_name']}"
| where timestamp between ((datetime(@{first(outputs('List_rows:_Get_Child_Test_Results')?['body/value'])?['cat_responsereceivedtimestamp']}) - 1h) .. (datetime(@{first(outputs('List_rows:_Get_Child_Test_Results')?['body/value'])?['cat_responsereceivedtimestamp']}) + 1h))
| extend Result = tostring(customDimensions.Result),
              Message = tostring(customDimensions.Message)
| project Result, Message

inputs.name: MultiturnResult

parameters.$filter:
_cat_copilottestrunid_value eq '@{triggerOutputs()?['body/InputParameters/CopilotTestRunId']}' 
and statecode eq 0 
and cat_resultcode ne 4 
and cat_CopilotTestId/cat_testtypecode eq 4 
and _cat_parent_value eq '@{items('Apply_to_each_Generative_Answers_Result')?['cat_copilottestresultid']}'

parameters.item/cat_errordetails:
@concat( outputs('Update_Copilot_Test_Run:_Running')?['body/cat_errordetails'], '
', '', workflow()?['tags']?['flowDisplayName'], ' flow run: Click here to open the flow run' )

@concat( body('Update_Copilot_Test_Run:_Running')?['cat_errordetails'], '
', 'Failed ', workflow()?['tags']?['flowDisplayName'], ' flow run: Click here to open the flow run' )

interval.count: @if(equals(parameters('Delay for Azure Application Insights Enrichment (Minutes) (cat_DelayforAzureApplicationInsightsEnrichment)'), null), 5, parameters('Delay for Azure Application Insights Enrichment (Minutes) (cat_DelayforAzureApplicationInsightsEnrichment)'))
